00040 struct fitdata {
00041 
00042   const size_t n;
00043   const real *x;
00044   const real *y;
00045   const real *sigma;
00046 
00047   fitdata( const size_t _n, const real *_x, const real *_y, const real *_sigma )
00048     : n( _n ), x( _x ), y( _y ), sigma( _sigma ) {}
00049 }
00050 ;
00051 
00052 struct fitdata_fix {
00053   const size_t n;
00054   const real *x;
00055   const real *y;
00056   const real *sigma;
00057   const real rvir;
00058   const real mvir;
00059 
00060   fitdata_fix( const size_t _n, const real *_x, const real *_y,
00061            const real *_sigma, const real _rvir, const real _mvir )
00062     : n( _n ), x( _x ), y( _y ), sigma( _sigma ), rvir( _rvir ), mvir( _mvir ) {}
00063 }
00064 ;

00067 void 
00068 print_state ( size_t iter, gsl_multifit_fdfsolver * s ) {
00069   /*std::cerr << "iter: " <<iter << "x= " <<gsl_vector_get (s->x, 0) //<< " " <<gsl_vector_get (s->x, 1)
00070     << "|f(x)|=" << gsl_blas_dnrm2 (s->f) << "\n";*/

00072 
00073 int 
00074 NFW_f( const gsl_vector *p, void* data, gsl_vector *f ) {
00075   struct fitdata * dataptr = ( struct fitdata* ) data;
00076   size_t n( dataptr->n );
00077   const real *x( dataptr->x );
00078   const real *y( dataptr->y );
00079   const real *sigma( dataptr->sigma );
00080 
00081   real deltac = gsl_vector_get( p, 0 );
00082   real rs = gsl_vector_get( p, 1 );
00083 
00084   for ( size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00085     real r = x[ i ];
00086     real Yi = deltac / ( ( r / rs ) * ( 1.0 + r / rs ) * ( 1.0 + r / rs ) );
00087     gsl_vector_set( f, i, ( Yi - y[ i ] ) / sigma[ i ] );
00088   }
00089 
00090   return GSL_SUCCESS;
00091 }
00092 
00093 int 
00094 NFW_fix_f( const gsl_vector *p, void* data, gsl_vector *f ) {
00095   struct fitdata_fix * dataptr = ( struct fitdata_fix* ) data;
00096   size_t n( dataptr->n );
00097   const real *x( dataptr->x );
00098   const real *y( dataptr->y );
00099   const real *sigma( dataptr->sigma );
00100   const real rvir( dataptr->rvir );
00101   const real mvir( dataptr->mvir );
00102 
00103   //  real deltac = gsl_vector_get(p,0);
00104   real rs = gsl_vector_get( p, 0 );
00105 
00106   real fac = mvir / ( 4.0 * M_PI * rs * rs * rs ) / ( log( ( rvir + rs ) / rs ) - rvir / ( rvir + rs ) );
00107 
00108   for ( size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00109     real r = x[ i ];
00110     real Yi = fac / ( ( r / rs ) * ( 1.0 + r / rs ) * ( 1.0 + r / rs ) );
00111     gsl_vector_set( f, i, ( Yi - y[ i ] ) / sigma[ i ] );
00112   }
00113 
00114   return GSL_SUCCESS;
00115 }
00116 
00117 int 
00118 NFW_df( const gsl_vector *p, void *data, gsl_matrix *J ) {
00119   struct fitdata * dataptr = ( struct fitdata* ) data;
00120   size_t n( dataptr->n );
00121   const real *x( dataptr->x );
00122   const real *sigma( dataptr->sigma );
00123 
00124   real deltac = gsl_vector_get( p, 0 );
00125   real rs = gsl_vector_get( p, 1 );
00126 
00127   for ( size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00128     real x1 = x[ i ] / rs;
00129     real x1p1 = 1.0 + x[ i ] / rs;
00130 
00131     real df_dp1 = 1.0 / ( x1 * x1p1 * x1p1 );
00132     real df_dp2 = deltac / ( x[ i ] * x1p1 * x1p1 ) + 2.0 * deltac / ( rs * x1p1 * x1p1 * x1p1 );
00133 
00134     gsl_matrix_set( J, i, 0, df_dp1 / sigma[ i ] );
00135     gsl_matrix_set( J, i, 1, df_dp2 / sigma[ i ] );
00136   }
00137 
00138   return GSL_SUCCESS;
00139 }

00145   size_t n( dataptr->n );

00154

00161   //      real df_dp2 = deltac/(x[i]*x1p1*x1p1)+2.0*deltac/(rs*x1p1*x1p1*x1p1);
00162

00170 
00171 int 
00172 NFW_fix_df( const gsl_vector *p, void *data, gsl_matrix *J ) {
00173   struct fitdata_fix * dataptr = ( struct fitdata_fix* ) data;
00174   size_t n( dataptr->n );
00175   const real *x( dataptr->x );
00176   const real *sigma( dataptr->sigma );
00177   const real rvir( dataptr->rvir );
00178   const real mvir( dataptr->mvir );
00179 
00180   real rs = gsl_vector_get( p, 0 );
00181 
00182   real a1 = mvir / ( 4.0 * M_PI * rs ) / pow( log( ( rvir + rs ) / rs ) * ( rvir + rs ) - rvir, 2 );
00183   real a2 = log( ( rvir + rs ) / rs ) * ( -2.0 * rvir * rvir * rs - 4.0 * rvir * rs * rs - 2.0 * rs * rs * rs ) + 3.0 * rvir * rvir * rs + 2.0 * rvir * rs * rs;
00184 
00185   for ( size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00186     real r = x[ i ];
00187     real df_dp1 = a1 * ( a2 + rvir * rvir * r ) / ( r * ( rs + r ) * ( rs + r ) * ( rs + r ) );
00188     gsl_matrix_set( J, i, 0, df_dp1 / sigma[ i ] );
00189   }
00190 
00191   return GSL_SUCCESS;
00192 }
00193 
00194 int 
00195 NFW_fdf( const gsl_vector *x, void *data, gsl_vector *f, gsl_matrix *J ) {
00196   NFW_f( x, data, f );
00197   NFW_df( x, data, J );
00198   return GSL_SUCCESS;
00199 }
00200 
00201 int 
00202 NFW_fix_fdf( const gsl_vector *x, void *data, gsl_vector *f, gsl_matrix *J ) {
00203   NFW_fix_f( x, data, f );
00204   NFW_fix_df( x, data, J );
00205   return GSL_SUCCESS;
00206 }
00207 
00208 int 
00209 NFW_fit( const std::vector<real>& r, const std::vector<real>& rho,
00210      const std::vector<real>& sigma_rho,
00211      real deltac0, real rs0,
00212      real& deltac, real& edeltac,
00213      real& rs, real& ers ) {
00214   assert( ( r.size() == rho.size() ) && ( r.size() == sigma_rho.size() ) );
00215 
00216   const gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_type *T;
00217   gsl_multifit_fdfsolver *s;
00218   unsigned iter( 0 );
00219   const size_t n = r.size();
00220   const size_t np = 2;
00221 
00222   gsl_matrix *covar = gsl_matrix_alloc( np, np );
00223 
00224   //  struct fitdata d = { n, &r[0], &rho[0], &sigma_rho[0] };
00225   struct fitdata d( n, &r[ 0 ], &rho[ 0 ], &sigma_rho[ 0 ] );
00226 
00227   gsl_multifit_function_fdf f;
00228   double x_init[ 2 ] = { deltac0, rs0 };
00229 
00230   gsl_vector_view x = gsl_vector_view_array( x_init, np );
00231 
00232   f.f = &NFW_f;
00233   f.df = &NFW_df;
00234   f.fdf = &NFW_fdf;
00235   f.n = n;
00236   f.p = np;
00237   f.params = &d;
00238 
00239   gsl_set_error_handler_off();
00240 
00241   T = gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_lmsder;
00242   s = gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_alloc( T, n, np );
00243   gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_set( s, &f, &x.vector );
00244 
00245   print_state( iter, s );
00246 
00247   int status;
00248   do {
00249     ++iter;
00250     status = gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_iterate( s );
00251     print_state( iter, s );
00252 
00253     if ( status )
00254       break;
00255 
00256     status = gsl_multifit_test_delta( s->dx, s->x, 1e-4, 1e-4 );
00257   } while ( status == GSL_CONTINUE && iter < 500 );
00258 
00259   gsl_multifit_covar( s->J, 0.0, covar );
00260 
00261   //#define FIT(i) gsl_vector_get(s->x, i )
00262   //#define ERR(i) sqrt(gsl_matrix_get(covar,i,i))
00263 
00264   real redchisq;
00265   real chi = gsl_blas_dnrm2( s->f );
00266   real dof = n - np;
00267   real c = GSL_MAX_DBL( 1, chi / sqrt( dof ) );
00268 
00269   redchisq = chi * chi / dof;
00270 
00271   gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_free( s );
00272   gsl_matrix_free( covar );
00273 
00274   if ( iter < 500 ) {
00275     deltac = gsl_vector_get( s->x, 0 );
00276     rs = gsl_vector_get( s->x, 1 );
00277 
00278     edeltac = c * sqrt( gsl_matrix_get( covar, 0, 0 ) );
00279     ers = c * sqrt( gsl_matrix_get( covar, 1, 1 ) );
00280 
00281     return 1;
00282   }
00283   return 0;
00284 
00285 }
00286 
00287 
00288 int 
00289 NFW_fix_fit( const std::vector<real>& r, const std::vector<real>& rho,
00290          const std::vector<real>& sigma_rho,
00291          real rvir, real mvir,
00292          real rs0, real& rs, real& ers ) {
00293   assert( ( r.size() == rho.size() ) && ( r.size() == sigma_rho.size() ) );
00294 
00295   const gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_type *T;
00296   gsl_multifit_fdfsolver *s;
00297   unsigned iter( 0 );
00298   const size_t n = r.size();
00299   const size_t np = 1;
00300 
00301   gsl_matrix *covar = gsl_matrix_alloc( np, np );
00302 
00303   //struct fitdata_fix d = { n, &r[0], &rho[0], &sigma_rho[0], rvir, mvir  };
00304   struct fitdata_fix d( n, &r[ 0 ], &rho[ 0 ], &sigma_rho[ 0 ], rvir, mvir );
00305 
00306   gsl_multifit_function_fdf f;
00307   double x_init[ np ] = { rs0 };
00308 
00309   gsl_vector_view x = gsl_vector_view_array( x_init, np );
00310 
00311   f.f = &NFW_fix_f;
00312   f.df = &NFW_fix_df;
00313   f.fdf = &NFW_fix_fdf;
00314   f.n = n;
00315   f.p = np;
00316   f.params = &d;
00317 
00318   gsl_set_error_handler_off();
00319 
00320   T = gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_lmsder;
00321   s = gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_alloc( T, n, np );
00322   gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_set( s, &f, &x.vector );
00323 
00324   print_state( iter, s );
00325 
00326   int status;
00327   do {
00328     ++iter;
00329     status = gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_iterate( s );
00330     print_state( iter, s );
00331 
00332     if ( status )
00333       break;
00334 
00335     status = gsl_multifit_test_delta( s->dx, s->x, 1e-4, 1e-4 );
00336   } while ( status == GSL_CONTINUE && iter < 500 );
00337 
00338   gsl_multifit_covar( s->J, 0.0, covar );
00339 
00340   //#define FIT(i) gsl_vector_get(s->x, i )
00341   //#define ERR(i) sqrt(gsl_matrix_get(covar,i,i))
00342 
00343   real redchisq;
00344   real chi = gsl_blas_dnrm2( s->f );
00345   real dof = n - np;
00346   real c = GSL_MAX_DBL( 1, chi / sqrt( dof ) );
00347 
00348   redchisq = chi * chi / dof;
00349 
00350   gsl_multifit_fdfsolver_free( s );
00351   gsl_matrix_free( covar );
00352 
00353   if ( iter < 500 ) {
00354     rs = gsl_vector_get( s->x, 0 );
00355     //rs      = gsl_vector_get(s->x,1);
00356 
00357     //    edeltac = c*sqrt(gsl_matrix_get(covar,0,0));
00358     ers = c * sqrt( gsl_matrix_get( covar, 0, 0 ) );
00359 
00360     return 1;
00361   }
00362 
00363   return 0;
00364 
00365 }
